qas.question: What period of music did the iPod help bring to a close?
In which industry did the iPod have a major impact?
What did the iPod promote that prompted a big change in the music industry?
The ease of collecting singles with the iPod and iTunes is credited with ending what "era" in pop music?

context: The iPod has also been credited with accelerating shifts within the <a1_0>music industry<a1_0/>. The iPod's popularization of <a2_0>digital music storage<a2_0/> allows users to abandon listening to entire albums and instead be able to choose specific singles which hastened the end of <a0_0><a3_0>the Album Era<a3_0/><a0_0/> in popular music.
